title: [Large-scale] Digital Game-Based Social Issue Resolution Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic game design understanding, foundational social science theory, and experience with collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Team-based collaborative creation of social issue-solving digital games in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can create a social phenomenon simulation prototype using game mechanics.
Learners can complete a playable game demo within 72 hours through role division among team members.
Learners can improve social problem-solving solutions by at least three methods based on game user testing results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
